item.title: 本次大选中，税收对市场的影响并不确定
item.description:
特朗普与哈里斯的博弈归根结底是 "视情况而定"。【原文：

Gaming out the Trump-Harris scenarios comes down to “it depends.”

】

item.title: 经理离职后，StanChart 调整了技术部门的一些重要职位
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）是一家专注于亚洲市场的贷款机构，在一名高管离职后，渣打银行对技术和运营部门的一些重要职位进行了调整。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc reshuffled some key roles in technology and operations after the departure of a senior executive at the Asia focused lender.】

item.title: 轰动一时的中国合并计划让未参与合并的公司股价飙升
item.description: 国泰君安证券股份有限公司（Guotai Junan Securities Co.）和海通证券股份有限公司（Haitong Securities Co.【原文：A small Chinese brokerage has emerged as an unlikely winner from the merger plan of industry leaders Guotai Junan Securities Co. and Haitong Securities Co., thanks to its name.】

item.title: 花旗称美国大选风险将使金属暂时受限
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Uncertainty around the US presidential election in November will prevent meaningful gains for metals by subduing global risk appetite and possibly delaying government stimulus in China, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 日元观察家警惕美国非农就业数据考验八月高点
item.description: 货币策略师们认为，如果薪资数据提振对美联储本月大幅降息的押注，那么日元兑美元汇率很有可能在周五晚些时候测试8月份的高点。【原文：Currency strategists see a strong chance of the yen testing its August high versus the dollar later Friday if payrolls data boost bets for a jumbo rate cut by the Federal Reserve this month.】

item.title: 中国收益率曲线陡峭化，中国人民银行回击债券涨势
item.description: 由于干预威胁促使交易商放缓购买长期债券，中国的主权收益率曲线正在陡峭化，这一举动可能会受到当局的欢迎。【原文：China’s sovereign yield curve is steepening, a move that’s likely to be welcomed by authorities, as the threat of intervention prompts traders to slow purchases of longer term bonds.】

item.title: 世界上最雄心勃勃的摩天大楼翻新计划
item.description:
位于伦敦的这座45层高的大厦计划进行彻底改造。KPF 建筑师阐述了他对这座大厦未来的展望和面临的挑战。【原文：

The 45-story tower in London is slated for a radical remake. The KPF architect lays out his vision of its future and the challenges ahead. 

】

item.title: 民调显示：尽管经济疲软，欧洲央行仍将继续季度减息
item.description: 根据一项对分析师的调查，欧洲中央银行不会通过更快地降低利率来应对欧元区经济的疲软。【原文：The European Central Bank won’t react to a weakening euro-zone economy by lowering interest rates more rapidly, according to a survey of analysts.】

item.title: 尼日利亚取消燃料补贴的举措对丹格特来说恰逢其时
item.description: 由于汽油紧缺，他的油箱已经 "见红"，出租车司机维克多-奥文达（Victor Ovundah）在尼日利亚哈科特港的一个加油站排了一夜的队，到早上快加满油时，销售突然停止了。【原文：With petrol scarce and his fuel tank on red, taxi driver Victor Ovundah queued overnight at a gas station in Port Harcourt, Nigeria and by morning was getting close to filling up when sales suddenly stopped.】

item.title: 印度可再生能源扩张受到恶劣天气数据的威胁
item.description: 行业领袖认为，印度需要升级其监测天气的方式，以便其清洁能源基础设施能够充分发挥潜力。【原文：India needs to upgrade the way it monitors weather so its clean energy infrastructure can reach its full potential, according to industry leaders.】

item.title: 印度连锁影院将依靠新电影实现复兴
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 腾讯支持的招聘网站股票可能因需求疲软而扩大 45% 的跌幅
item.description: 由于中国的经济困境削弱了对工人的需求，中国顶级在线招聘公司的股价最近可能会继续暴跌。【原文：A recent plunge in shares of China’s top online recruitment firm may have further to run as the nation’s economic struggles sap demand for workers.】

item.title: 香港引领亚洲基础设施绿色债券销售热潮
item.description: 香港流行的绿色债券正成为支付未来几年将达到峰值的基础设施成本的重要工具。【原文：Hong Kong’s popular green bonds are becoming a key tool to cover infrastructure costs set to peak in the next several years.】

item.title: 中国钢铁危机导致铁矿石价格跌至三月以来最差一周
item.description: 铁矿石走低，创下 3 月份以来最差一周，中国陷入困境的钢铁市场几乎没有复苏的迹象。【原文：Iron ore edged lower toward its worst week since March, with few signs of a recovery for China’s beleaguered steel market.】

item.title: 工会丑闻又牵出一位澳大利亚养老基金主任
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 First Super 的联席主席已退出董事会，此前监管机构宣布计划起诉该董事与陷入丑闻的建筑工会的关系。【原文：The co-chair of Australian pension fund First Super has stepped down from its board after the regulator announced plans to sue the director over his ties to a construction union mired in scandal.】

item.title: 一切都瘫痪了罢工使哥伦比亚石油公司瘫痪
item.description: 古斯塔沃-彼得罗于 2022 年上台，承诺改善数千万贫困哥伦比亚人的生活。两年后，受腐败丑闻、内阁不断更迭和国会改革失败的困扰，他正面临着总统任期内最大的社会危机。【原文：Gustavo Petro took power in 2022 pledging to improve the lives of tens of millions of poor Colombians. Two years later, plagued by corruption scandals, constant cabinet changes and failed reforms in congress, he’s facing the biggest social crisis of his presidency yet.】

item.title: 中国前央行行长罕见回应通货紧缩担忧
item.description: 中国人民银行前行长易纲表示，中国应集中精力应对通货紧缩，这是中国一位知名人士罕见地承认物价下跌正威胁着中国的经济增长前景。【原文：Former People’s Bank of China Governor Yi Gang said his nation should focus on fighting deflation, in a rare admission by a prominent figure in China that falling prices are threatening the country’s growth outlook.】

item.title: 另一艘黑暗舰队船只将停靠俄罗斯北极液化天然气厂
item.description: 俄罗斯疑似黑暗舰队的一艘船正准备停靠该国最新的液化天然气设施，尽管美国的制裁不断收紧，莫斯科仍在继续努力推进出口。【原文：A vessel in Russia’s suspected dark fleet is preparing to dock at the nation’s newest liquefied natural gas facility, as Moscow continues to attempt to push forward with exports despite ever-tightening US sanctions.】

item.title: 创纪录的回报率是中国科技股下滑的一线希望
item.description: 中国最大的科技公司比以往任何时候都更多地将现金返还给股东，因为它们继续加大回购力度，以支撑其岌岌可危的股票。【原文：China’s largest technology companies are returning more of their cash to shareholders than ever before, as they continue to ramp up buybacks to support their flagging stocks.】

item.title: 工会主席抨击美国钢铁公司首席执行官，称公司交易存在缺陷
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）准备阻止该交易之际，美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers）负责人表示，新日本钢铁公司需要重新修改其收购美国钢铁公司的交易，以赢得工会的支持，并建议美国公司董事会考虑更换其首席执行官。【原文：The head of the United Steelworkers said Nippon Steel Corp. needs to rework its deal for United States Steel Corp. to win the union’s support and suggested the American company’s board consider replacing its CEO, as President Joe Biden prepares to block the transaction.】

item.title: Seven & I Dips on Plans to tell Couche-Tard Proposal too low
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co.因其计划告知 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.其对这家日本便利店运营商的收购方案不够充分而下跌，之后该公司股价攀升，表明投资者正试图评估是继续谈判还是拒绝交易。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. climbed after dipping on its plans to tell Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. that its buyout proposal for the Japanese convenience store operator is insufficient, suggesting that investor are trying to assess whether negotiations will continue or the rejection closes the door to a deal.】

item.title: 美国薪资数据公布前降息希望升温，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在周五晚些时候将公布更多数据之前，最新的美国就业数据提振了黄金，使其保持在每盎司 2,500 美元上方。【原文：Gold held an advance above $2,500 an ounce, bolstered by the latest US jobs reading ahead of more data due later Friday, which could prove key in determining the size of the Federal Reserve’s rate cut this month.】

item.title: 欧佩克+推迟增加供应，原油每周大幅下跌
item.description: 由于对需求疲软和供应充足的持续担忧，欧佩克+推迟了增产计划，石油有望在本周出现大幅下跌。【原文：Oil was poised for a deep weekly loss on persistent concerns about soft demand and ample supply, with OPEC+ delaying a planned increase in production amid the dour outlook.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。大家都在关注期待已久的美国就业报告，华尔街大胆押注降息，欧佩克+暂停增加供应。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. All eyes on the much-awaited US jobs report, Wall Street makes bold bets on interest-rate cuts, and OPEC+ pauses on hiking supply. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 空头支票市场升温，安德雷蒂重返 SPAC 体育馆
item.description: 前印地赛车（IndyCar）车手迈克尔-安德雷蒂（Michael Andretti）又带着另一家空头支票公司回来了，因为在美国市场上，曾经炙手可热的投资趋势呈现出新的势头，大部分经验丰富的支持者都吸引了数十亿美元的现金。【原文：Former IndyCar driver Michael Andretti is back with another blank-check firm as the US market for a once-hot investing trend shows new momentum with mostly seasoned backers attracting billions in cash.】

item.title: 超强台风将于周五上午停止港股交易
item.description: 超强台风 "八木 "掠过香港金融中心，预计周五上午香港 4.9 万亿美元的股票市场将与香港其他地区一起关闭。【原文：Hong Kong is expected to shut its $4.9 trillion stock market Friday morning along with the rest of the city as Super Typhoon Yagi skirts the financial hub.】

item.title: 美元和股市在美国就业数据公布前面临压力：市场综述
item.description: 周五将公布就业数据，这些数据将有助于确定美联储本月降息的幅度，在此之前，美国股市和美元指数下跌。【原文：US stocks and an index of the dollar fell ahead of jobs data due Friday that will help determine the size of a Federal Reserve rate cut this month.】

item.title: 惠誉上调邦吉评级，Viterra 交易看似更加确定
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）上调了邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）的信用评级，使这家农业公司进一步跻身投资级行列，因为该公司斥资 82 亿美元收购嘉能可（Glencore Plc）支持的 Viterra 公司的交易正变得更加确定。【原文：Bunge Global SA’s credit rating was raised by Fitch Ratings, putting the agriculture company further into investment grade as its $8.2 billion deal to acquire Glencore Plc-backed Viterra is looking more certain.】

item.title: 企业竞相涌入美国债务市场，原因何在？
item.description: 从表面上看，美国企业债务市场的借贷激增似乎有些奇怪。尽管人们对美联储期待已久的货币政策转向宽松感到兴奋，但美联储还没有这样做。事实上，美联储的基准利率仍停留在二十多年来的高位。但是，在美国企业的上上下下，在蓝筹股企业和那些债务负担沉重的企业，高管们正以迅猛的速度向华尔街借贷现金。这正是人们所期待的。【原文：The surge of borrowing in the US corporate debt market, on the surface, looks odd. Despite all the excitement about the Federal Reserve’s long-awaited pivot toward easing monetary policy, it hasn’t done so yet. In fact, its benchmark interest rate is still pinned at a more than two-decade high. But up and down corporate America, at blue-chip businesses and those heavily burdened by debts, executives are turning to Wall Street to borrow cash at a blistering pace. It’s the sort of stampede expecte】
